General.Name: Kunshan Kinglai Hygienic Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Kunshan Kinglai Hygienic Materials Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of clean and high-purity stainless steel application materials in China. Its products include pipeline fittings, valves, pumps, chambers, and heat exchangers, homogenizers, etc. The products are mainly used in food safety, biomedicine, and pan-semiconductor sectors. Kunshan Kinglai Hygienic Materials Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Kunshan, China.
General.Address: No. 22, Lufeng West Road, Kunshan, China, 215331
